subject: Remember to check your eligibility to finance your Howdens kitchen

rows.text: Howdens have partnered with Kanda to allow you apply for finance for your new Howdens kitchen purchase. We noticed you haven’t checked if you’re eligible for finance yet. Click below to complete a short eligibility checker and set your budget.

rows.subtext: For finance queries please email Kanda at howdens@kanda.co.uk or call us on 0330 808 3911. For order queries, please email {{extras.branch.contact_email}} or call {{extras.branch.contact_phone}}.
